name: Rise of the Dragon
description:
Rise of the Dragon is an adventure game developed by Dynamix and GAME ARTS. It was originally released in 1989. It was published by Sierra On-Line. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Rise of the Dragon is available on Commodore / Amiga, Classic Macintosh, SEGA CD and PC. The game is sold via GOG.
It was directed by Alan McKean and Jeffrey Tunnell. Christopher Stevens, Don Latarski and Noriyuki Iwadare scored the game.
